data.actual_result: The Text isnt been Formatted , i.e., the text is in bold and the remaining 1 * isnt formatted
data.expected_result: The Text Should Be Formatted As Usual.
data.short_description: [ Resubmited ] [ Android Specific] Markdown Formatting Error happens when you leave space before a *
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a markdown for Italic + bold meaning 3 *'s before text. - Then , leave a space after the sentence/word n then put 3 *'s - For example, if `'` is assumed as a `star` (as i cant use star here) , so, write the text as `'''Test '''` - Observe.
